heading: API
explanation: When enabled, this exposes a public API endpoint which returns general information about this guild via the following endpoint.

allowedorigins.heading: Allowed Origins
allowedorigins.description: A comma separated list of origin URLs set via the <1>Access-Control-Allow-Origin</1> header in the API response. That means, that the information provided via this API endpoint are only requestable in a browser on a website which has one of the given URLs. If nothing is set, <2>*</2> is used as value for the header which allows every website to request the resource.

token.heading: Access Token
token.description: Specify a token to protect the endpoint against unauthorized access. When set, you need to pass the token either as a value of the <1>Authorization</1> header with the token type <2>bearer</2> or via the <3>token</3> URL parameter on reqeusting the resource.

notifications.reset: Token has been reset. The endpoint is now unprotected!
